activities.name: Hamstring Stretch
activities.description: Stretch your hamstrings by reaching for your toes while keeping your legs straight.

activities.name: Shoulder Stretch
activities.description: Extend one arm across your chest and use the other to gently pull it closer.

activities.name: Quadriceps Stretch
activities.description: Stand on one leg and pull the opposite foot toward your buttocks to stretch the quad.

activities.name: Side Stretch
activities.description: Reach one arm overhead and lean to the opposite side to stretch your obliques.

activities.name: Neck Stretch
activities.description: Tilt your head to one side, bringing your ear closer to your shoulder to stretch your neck.

activities.name: Cat-Cow Stretch
activities.description: Alternate between arching your back and rounding it while on your hands and knees.

activities.name: Seated Forward Fold
activities.description: Sit on the floor with legs extended and reach forward toward your toes.

activities.name: Butterfly Stretch
activities.description: Sit on the floor with your feet together and knees out, then gently press your knees downward.

activities.name: Calf Stretch
activities.description: Place one foot behind you and press the heel into the floor while leaning forward.

activities.name: Lower Back Stretch
activities.description: Lie on your back and pull your knees toward your chest to stretch your lower back.

activities.name: Push-Ups
activities.description: Perform a plank position and lower your body until your chest is near the floor, then push up.

activities.name: Lunges
activities.description: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.

activities.name: Jumping Jacks
activities.description: Jump with legs spread wide and arms overhead, then return to the starting position.

activities.name: Squats
activities.description: Lower your body into a sitting position with your feet shoulder-width apart, then return to standing.

activities.name: Mountain Climbers
activities.description: In a plank position, alternate bringing your knees toward your chest in a running motion.

activities.name: Burpees
activities.description: Drop into a squat, kick your feet back into a plank, return to a squat, and jump upward.

activities.name: Plank
activities.description: Hold your body in a straight line with your forearms and toes on the ground.

activities.name: High Knees
activities.description: Run in place while bringing your knees up toward your chest as high as possible.

activities.name: Side Lunges
activities.description: Step out to one side, bending the knee while keeping the other leg straight, then return to standing.

activities.name: Leg Raises
activities.description: Lie on your back and lift your legs straight up, then lower them without touching the floor.
